text: What About Now is the twelfth studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and was released on March 8, 2013 through Island Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Austria, Canada, Spain, Sweden and the United States. It went to number 2 in Germany, Japan, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal and the United Kingdom and number 3 in Finland, Ireland and Switzerland. == Track listing == *All tracks produced by John Shanks. Co-produced by Jon Bon Jovi and Richie Sambora. == References == Category:2013 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: What About Now (album)
